jobs.title: Sales Development Representative
jobs.description:
**Company Description**

Poplar (https://poplar.studio/) is on a mission to democratise the creation of augmented reality content. Through our community of 1,400+ AR creators, our platform has enabled the production of amazing augmented reality experiences (https://poplar.studio/showcase/) for major brands including Universal Music, Sony Music, Fox, Disney, L’Oréal, King, and Speedo amongst many others.

This is a great opportunity to join a small but ambitious team in a fast-moving industry with an experienced founding team, strong backing (Fuel Ventures, Founders Factory, Haatch Ventures, Ascension Ventures, Super Ventures) and an array of exciting clients.

**Job Description**

We’re looking for a Sales Development Representative (SDR) to join our growing team based in London. As a Sales Development Representative, you will work closely with the Business Development team to uncover new opportunities. You’re providing quality, actionable information to Business Development in order to bring in new business.

As this is a junior role, you will receive mentorship and support from the team in learning about the AR industry, the advertising sector, how to effectively find clients and convert opportunities into revenue. This will give you amazing exposure to the wider business - also one of the benefits of being at a startup! This stepping stone position is great for anyone looking to work in the fast-paced world of a pioneering digital technology company.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Generate scalable, high-quality leads and manage the lead generation process
* Respond to inbound leads and quickly identify valuable opportunities
* Identify decision-makers and research prospects' contact information
* Drive revenue growth through outreach emails & phone calls with a focus on setting up meetings for the Business Development team members
* Work with Business Development to keep CRM (HubSpot) fully up to date and the pipeline current
* Update Company Dashboards on a weekly basis
* Work closely with the Business Development team on other projects

**In your first month**

We are in a new, exciting technical space so your focus will be on learning as much as you can about Augmented Reality - a good place to start is our blog (http://poplar.studio/blog/).

We have built great relationships in the market before and kept things documented on HubSpot. How quickly can you catch?

You will also begin your first outreach activities, with your mentor on hand to guide you.  

We will test your ability to perform some tasks in interviews, but feel free to state your case and show evidence in your initial application. 

**Qualifications**

*Successful Candidates Will Be*

* Entrepreneurial, driven, and possess a results-focused mindset
* Well-organised and diligent in following through
* Tactful and creatively persistent
* Collaborative
* Interested in working in Augmented Reality
* Interested in working in a startup environment
* Tech-savvy with proficiency with Gmail, Google Drive etc.
* Highly accomplished in written and verbal communication skills

**Optional Requirements**

* Recent graduate
* Previous internship experience
* Experience in sales research, working in a tech startup

**Additional Information**

*What We Offer*

* Flexible working hours - we care about getting the job done more than the exact hours you’re at your desk.
* Equity - we believe employees should share in the success of the business.
* Fun and supportive culture - we firmly believe in fostering a positive work environment, which means having fun as a team while challenging ourselves. (https://poplar.studio/about-poplar/)
* Support for community projects - we believe volunteering and community activities shouldn’t come out of your 25 days’ holiday allowance. For example, our CEO is a Trustee of Save the Children UK and our CTO runs his own non-profit music project.
* Inspiring surroundings - our office is filled with green life, but we also take the time to run offsites elsewhere in London (and beyond).
* Opportunity to learn rapidly - you’ll be working with experienced media tech pioneers in a fast-paced company and industry.
* Dog-friendly environment - just ask our office dogs, Indiya and Flip.
* https://www.instagram.com/indiyathepuppy/
* https://www.instagram.com/flipthepuppy/

Location: London, UK (remote during COVID-19)

We are committed to building a diverse culture and are eager to receive applications from all backgrounds. All applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, or age.
